Actions.Text: REFERENCE CHANGED TO WAYS AND MEANS

Title: Revives provisions of law relating to authorizing the use of existing village sewer rents for infrastructure projects other than sewer projects in the village of Baldwinsville
Summary: Revives provisions of law relating to authorizing the use of existing village sewer rents for infrastructure projects other than sewer projects in the village of Baldwinsville.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 198 of the laws of 2021, relating to authorizing the use of existing village sewer rents for infrastructure projects other than sewer projects in the village of Baldwinsville, in relation to the effectiveness thereof
